simple.escp.json

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.json.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for parsing.

      • setDetail

        public void setDetail(javax.json.JsonArray detail)
        Set the "detail" section. If this method is called more than once, it will append the JsonArray to previous detail.
        Parameters:
        detail - a JsonArray.

      • parse

        public Report parse()
        Before calling this method, don't forget to call setters such as setFirstPage(), setLastPage(), setDetail(), etc. The parse result from this method can also be obtained later by calling getResult().
        Returns:
        result of parsing in Pages.

      • getResult

        public Report getResult()
        Get the result of previous parse() invocation. If parse() hasn't been invoked before, this method will invoke it and return the result.
        Returns:
        result of parsing in Pages.
